verbs.description: at 71 enfield man [V: does] n't let age get in the way as he runs seventh hartford marathon kiran majmudar of enfield began training for the 2012 hartford marathon at the age of 65 worried that he would be the oldest runner in his training group that fear quickly vanished and he has run it five times since and will run again saturday at age 71 kiran majmudar hartford anang enfield eversource hartford marathon marathon
